channel.title: Business on Carl Gaspar
channel.description: Recent content in Business on Carl Gaspar

item.title: carldss.com - Custom Collectible Cards
item.description:
I’ve created Carldss as a token/reward for the basketball players of our REC LEAGUE. It’s a custom designed card with the players’ information, stats, the league, and player image. To see all leagues that I’m working on, check ALL LEAGUES.

I’m hoping to include more leagues and improve my network. Reach out to me in any of my SOCIALS if you want one.

Details

  • WKND G League Season 1
  • Best Player of the Game - Round 1 vs Black - October 29, 2025
  • From Red Team, Point Guard / Center
  • GASPAR CARL with 99 overall rating, 45pts, 12stls, 2rebs, and 8asts
  • More details: Rare, Original Card, 1 of 1, Batch 0

Poster
